issue.title: [Parquet][C++] Accelerate bit-packing decoding with AVX-512
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18362](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18362). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Accelerate Parquet bit-packing decoding with AVX-512 instructions?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18362?focusedCommentId=17635863) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Are you willing to contribute this?
